predict_bboxes_detectron2[source]

predict_bboxes_detectron2(path_to_model_config:"Path to pretrained model folder", path_to_image:"Path to image to annotate", outfile:"Path and filename for output raster", processing_dir:"Directory to save the intermediate tiles. Deleted after use", tile_size:"Tile size to use. Default 400x400px tiles", tile_overlap:"Tile overlap to use. Default 100px", use_tta:"Use test-time augmentation", smooth_preds:"Run fill_holes and dilate_erode to masks")

Detect bounding boxes from a new image using a pretrained model

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

predict_instance_masks_detectron2[source]

predict_instance_masks_detectron2(path_to_model_config:"Path to pretrained model folder", path_to_image:"Path to image to annotate", outfile:"Path and filename for output raster", processing_dir:"Directory to save the intermediate tiles. Deleted after use", tile_size:"Tile size to use. Default 400x400px tiles", tile_overlap:"Tile overlap to use. Default 100px", use_tta:"Use test-time augmentation", smooth_preds:"Run fill_holes and dilate_erode to masks")

Segment instance masks from a new image using a pretrained model
